citation: Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Amendment Order 2019 (Tas)
text:
Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Amendment Order 2019

I make the following order under section 197 of the Inland Fisheries Act 1995 .

12 June 2019

GUY BARNETT

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Amendment Order 2019 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Order 1996 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Order 1996 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 June 2019

This order is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
